item.title: European Leaders Look for Allies to Secure Ukraine-Russia Peace Deal
item.description: European leaders met in London to formulate a plan to help end the war in Ukraine. But even potential peacekeepers face political and economic hurdles...

item.title: Pope Experiences Another Setback With Respiratory Crisis
item.description: The Vatican said that Monday’s crisis was caused by a significant accumulation of mucus in his bronchial tubes.

item.title: Drones Now Rule the Battlefield in the Ukraine-Russia War
item.description: Drones have changed the war in Ukraine, with soldiers adapting off-the-shelf models and swarming the front lines.

item.title: Zelensky Turns to Diplomacy in a War With ‘a Long Way to Go’
item.description: After a startling clash with President Trump, who has echoed the Kremlin view of the war, Ukraine’s leader is trying to shore up European support and ...

item.title: At Least Two Killed After Car Rams Crowd in Mannheim, Germany
